title: Classic Caesar Salad
ingredients: Dressing: 1 egg yolk, 1 tsp Dijon, 1 clove garlic, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 2 anchovy fillets, 1/3 cup olive oil, salt, pepper
steps: Blend dressing ingredients (except oil) until smooth. Stream in olive oil to emulsify. Season to taste.
Toss romaine with dressing to lightly coat.
Top with croutons and Parmesan. Serve immediately.
notes: Use pasteurized yolk if preferred; add a dash of Worcestershire for extra depth.
